adherenceSteps: Only points to publicly available documents and resources

standardsList: In terms of formats, the index supports HTML5
We also offer resources to support WebXR, the open XR standard supported by the W3C
bestPracticesList: We also believe in the Principles for Digital Development, as the project:
- Aims to reuse and improve accessible code so developers don't have to recreate accessibility features from scratch
- Leverages as many open source resources as possible
- Attempts to understand the existing ecosystem by supporting the tools that developers are actively using
- Is collaborative, asking developers to share new resources and code as they find it

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: As an index of resources there isn't a huge capacity for harm, but we as the moderators of the resource vet all submissions for accuracy and keep harmful or hazardous material off of the site.

dataPrivacySecurity.privacySecurityDescription: Only points to publicly available documents and resources

inappropriateIllegalContent.type: Guidelines and code snippets for accessible XR
inappropriateIllegalContent.illegalContentDetectionMechanism: Only content submitted through the resource suggestion form and approved by moderators is shared
